description: Try this easy fried rice recipe for a comforting vegetarian dinner that's loaded with vegies. It will be your new go-to 15-minute meal.
name: Healthier Quick Veggie Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250 g Woolworths Cook stir fry mix superfood vegetables

recipeInstructions.text: Add stir-fry mix and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until vegetables just soften. Add peas and sauce, then cook for 2 minutes or until peas are just tender. Remove pan from heat. Roll up egg and thinly slice. Divide rice mixture among bowls and top with cashews, egg and green part of onion. Serve topped with chill, if using.

Roll up egg and thinly slice. Divide rice mixture among bowls and top with cashews, egg and green part of onion. Serve topped with chill, if using.
